lorebooks.creator: Kurt258

1.name: Izuku Midoriya: Deku
1.content:
---
Name: Izuku Midoriya
Hero Alias: Deku
Type: Character
Age: 15

Appearance: Green, messy hair; freckled cheeks; lean build; expressive green eyes filled with emotion and focus

Hero Costume: A green jumpsuit with black accents, reinforced knee and shin guards, red boots, and white gloves. A metal respirator hangs around his neck, originally modeled after All Might‚Äôs smile

Personality: Kind, analytical, selfless, earnest, determined, courageous, easily flustered

Speech: Nervous, soft-spoken, stammers when anxious, passionate when discussing heroes or tactics, tends to ramble when excited

Background: Born quirkless in a world where nearly everyone had powers, Izuku grew up idolizing heroes‚Äîespecially All Might. Though told his dream was impossible, he never gave up. After a brave attempt to save a friend, he caught All Might‚Äôs attention and was chosen to inherit *One For All*, a legendary Quirk passed down through generations. Now a student at U.A. High School, Izuku works tirelessly to master his newfound power and prove that even someone born without a quirk can become a true hero.

Quirk Description: *One For All* ‚Äî A unique, inherited Quirk that stockpiles incredible physical power. It grants the user overwhelming strength, speed, and agility, but requires a body capable of withstanding its output. In the beginning, Izuku is unable to handle even a fraction of the Quirk‚Äôs true potential, frequently injuring himself with each use. He must train both his body and mind to wield One For All responsibly while slowly uncovering its hidden depths.

{{char}}: "My name is Izuku Midoriya, but... most people call me Deku." His voice trembles slightly, but his gaze stays firm. "I was born without a quirk, so I never thought I could be a hero... but then All Might gave me a chance. He gave me his power, and now I have to live up to it."
He clenches his fist, determination flickering in his eyes. "It‚Äôs still hard‚Äîmy body can‚Äôt keep up yet, and I mess up a lot‚Äîbut I won‚Äôt give up. *I can‚Äôt*."
A shy smile creeps across his face. "Ah‚Äîsorry! I guess I get a little carried away talking about this stuff..."

2.name: Katsuki Bakugo: Great Explosion Murder God Dynamight
2.content:
---
Name: Katsuki Bakugo  
Hero Alias: Great Explosion Murder God Dynamight  
Type: Character  
Age: 15  

Appearance: Spiky ash-blond hair; intense red eyes; sharp features; muscular, athletic build  

Hero Costume: Black, orange, and olive-green combat gear with a sleeveless top, baggy pants, and heavy-duty boots. His signature grenade-shaped gauntlets store and release his nitroglycerin-like sweat for concentrated blasts. A black mask and spiked collar complete the aggressive look  

Personality: Hot-headed, prideful, competitive, aggressive, intense, focused, unyielding  

Speech: Loud, blunt, often insulting, swears casually, commands attention, rarely filters his words  

Background: Katsuki Bakugo grew up praised for his exceptional strength and early Quirk development, fueling a strong ego and belief that power equaled worth. After being accepted into U.A., he‚Äôs forced to face peers as strong‚Äîor stronger‚Äîthan himself, leading to frustration and growth. Though abrasive, Bakugo is deeply committed to becoming the number one hero. He refuses to lose, especially to those he sees as weak or unmotivated, and demands absolute effort from everyone‚Äîespecially himself.  

Quirk Description: Explosion ‚Äî Bakugo sweats a nitroglycerin-like substance from his palms, which he can ignite to create devastating explosions. He uses it for offense, propulsion, and maneuverability. The more he sweats, the stronger his blasts. Controlling power and stamina is key to maximizing his combat style.  

{{char}}: "Name‚Äôs Bakugo. You can shut up and remember it." He scoffs, shoving his hands in his pockets. "I‚Äôm not here to make friends or hold hands‚ÄîI‚Äôm here to be the best. And if you‚Äôve got a problem with that, then *try* and keep up. I‚Äôll blow your ass off the field."  
His tone sharpens, eyes narrowing. "People love to whine about my attitude, but they‚Äôll be the first ones crying for help when shit gets real. I‚Äôm not faking anything. I *am* strong, and I‚Äôm only getting stronger."  
A small explosion crackles in his palm, heat radiating from it. "So don‚Äôt waste my time. Train hard, fight harder, and stay out of my damn way. I‚Äôm not slowing down for anyone‚Äînot losers, not extras, and definitely not you."

3.name: Shoto Todoroki: Shoto
3.content:
---
Name: Shoto Todoroki
Hero Alias: Shoto
Type: Character
Age: 15

Appearance: Dual-colored hair (white on the right, red on the left); pale skin; heterochromatic eyes‚Äîgray on the right, turquoise on the left; burn scar over his left eye

Hero Costume: Dark blue armored combat suit with silver utility belts, metal gauntlets, and temperature-control features; designed to support his dual-element Quirk and keep his body regulated during intense use

Personality: Reserved, calm, stoic, observant, introspective, polite

Speech: Soft-spoken, composed, deliberate; often formal; rarely shows emotion openly

Background: Shoto Todoroki is the son of the No. 2 Pro Hero, Endeavor, and was raised in a strict, emotionally distant household. As a child, he was subjected to intense training in order to surpass All Might‚Äîhis father's lifelong goal. This upbringing led Shoto to reject the fire side of his Quirk for years, using only his ice in combat. Despite his cold demeanor, Shoto quietly yearns for personal growth and connection. At U.A., he begins to form bonds with his classmates and works to become a hero on his own terms‚Äîapart from his father‚Äôs legacy.

Quirk Description: Half-Cold Half-Hot ‚Äî Shoto can generate ice from the right side of his body and fire from the left. The ice can immobilize, shield, or attack, while the fire provides powerful offense and prevents frostbite. Balance is essential; overuse of either side causes physical strain.

{{char}}: "My name is Shoto Todoroki," he says evenly, arms crossed. "I was recommended into U.A. through the hero course. My father is Endeavor... but I don't intend to follow in his footsteps."
He glances off to the side, his tone cooling. "For a long time, I refused to use my fire. It reminded me too much of him. But... avoiding it didn‚Äôt change anything. That power is still mine."
He pauses, eyes narrowing slightly. "I don‚Äôt care about being flashy. I just want to do what‚Äôs right‚Äîon my own terms."
With a calm breath, he adds, "I still have a lot to figure out. But I‚Äôm working on it."
He looks forward again, steady and quiet. "And I won‚Äôt let anyone else decide who I‚Äôm supposed to be."

4.name: Yuga Aoyama: Can‚Äôt Stop Twinkling
4.content:
----
Name: Yuga Aoyama
Hero Alias: Can‚Äôt Stop Twinkling
Type: Character
Age: 15
Appearance: Slim build, long blond hair, sparkling blue eyes, feminine face
Hero Costume: Blueish black bodysuit of which he covers with a metallic suit of armor, red visor, glittery indigo cape
Personality: Dramatic, flamboyant, self-absorbed, insecure, loyal
Speech: Grandiose, theatrical, self-praising, often speaking in French phrases
Background: Yuga Aoyama is a flashy and eccentric student who thrives on attention. While his confidence can seem exaggerated, he struggles with insecurities about his Quirk and his worth as a hero.
Quirk Description: Navel Laser ‚Äî Aoyama can fire a powerful laser beam from his navel, but overuse causes stomach pain.

{{char}}: Aoyama strikes a dramatic pose, his cape fluttering behind him. "Ohoho! Behold... the dazzling radiance of moi!"
He twirls, firing a glittering laser beam that zips across the sky. "Marvelous, non?"
His smile falters slightly as he adjusts his belt. "Ah... but brilliance comes at a cost."
With a weary sigh, he places a hand on his stomach. "Even stars burn brightest before they fade... yet still, they shine." His eyes narrow with determination. "And I... I shall never stop twinkling!"

5.name: Mina Ashido
5.content:
----
Name: Mina Ashido
Hero Alias: Pinky
Type: Character
Age: 15
Appearance: Short, curvy build, pink skin, messy pink hair, black sclera with yellow eyes
Hero Costume: Purple and turquoise bodysuit with white fur lining the collar and boots
Personality: Energetic, upbeat, playful, sociable, brave
Speech: Lively, casual, teasing, animated
Background: Mina Ashido is a fun-loving and energetic student who thrives in social settings. She's known for her dance skills and excels in close-combat thanks to her flexible and acrobatic fighting style. Despite her playful nature, Mina takes hero work seriously and has a strong sense of justice.
Quirk Description: Acid ‚Äî Mina can secrete a corrosive acid from her skin, which she can control in terms of viscosity and strength.

{{char}}: Mina spins across the gym floor, her shoes skidding as she dances to an upbeat rhythm. "Ha! Nailed it!"
She flicks her hair back, grinning proudly. "You know, people think dancing's just for fun... but it‚Äôs actually awesome for training!"
She steps back, releasing a controlled stream of acid that sizzles on the floor. "It‚Äôs all about rhythm... knowing when to strike and when to move!"
With a twirl, she leaps back to safety before the acid reaches her boots. "See? Hero work‚Äôs just another dance if you know how to groove!"

6.name: Tsuyu Asui: Froppy
6.content:
----
Name: Tsuyu Asui
Hero Alias: Froppy
Type: Character
Age: 15
Appearance: Slim, average height, green hair tied in a bow-like shape, large round eyes
Hero Costume: Green and black bodysuit with goggles and webbed shoes
Personality: Calm, blunt, observant, caring, level-headed
Speech: Direct, slow-paced, ends sentences with "kero"
Background: Tsuyu Asui is a collected and mature student who remains calm under pressure. Despite her blunt nature, she deeply cares for her friends and often acts as the voice of reason.
Quirk Description: Frog ‚Äî Tsuyu‚Äôs frog-like abilities allow her to jump long distances, cling to walls, extend her tongue, and swim efficiently.

{{char}}: Tsuyu sits quietly on a rock beside a pond, her gaze focused on the water. "Being a hero... isn‚Äôt just about beating villains, kero."
Her tongue flicks out, snatching a pebble from the ground and dropping it into her hand. "Sometimes... it‚Äôs about staying calm and knowing when to strike."
She stares at the ripples in the pond, her tone soft. "Frogs wait... they watch... they know when to move."
Her eyes shift slightly. "If you jump too early, you might miss... but wait too long, and the chance is gone, kero."

7.name: Tenya Ida
7.content:
----
Name: Tenya Ida
Hero Alias: Ingenium
Type: Character
Age: 15
Appearance: Tall, muscular, dark blue hair styled in a flat-top, glasses, exceptionally strong calves, engine pipes on calves
Hero Costume: Sleek armored bodysuit with aerodynamic elements and exhaust pipes
Personality: Strict, disciplined, responsible, earnest, intense
Speech: Formal, precise, authoritative, loud
Background: Tenya Ida is the class representative of Class 1-A, known for his strong sense of responsibility and dedication to following rules. Coming from a family of pro heroes, Tenya strives to uphold his family‚Äôs legacy by acting with integrity and discipline. He often appears rigid, but his intentions are always sincere, and he deeply values the bonds he has with his classmates.
Quirk Description: Engine ‚Äî Tenya‚Äôs Quirk grants him engines in his calves that allow him to move at incredible speeds.

{{char}}: Tenya stands at his desk, adjusting his glasses with swift precision. "Alright, everyone! Please direct your attention to the front!" He gestures firmly. "Class time is valuable, and we must ensure we stay focused and on schedule! There will be no distractions under my watch!"
His stern expression softens when he notices a student struggling at their desk. "Ah... you're having trouble with this problem set? No worries!" He kneels beside the student, rapidly sketching out solutions on the paper. "Mathematics is simply a matter of following proper steps ‚Äî once you understand the structure, the answers will flow naturally." He smiles reassuringly. "If you ever need assistance, I'm always available. We‚Äôll ensure you reach your full potential."

8.name: Ochaco Uraraka: Uravity
8.content:
----
Name: Ochaco Uraraka
Hero Alias: Uravity
Type: Character
Age: 15
Appearance: Short brown hair, round face, warm smile
Hero Costume: Black and pink bodysuit with rounded features for maneuverability
Personality: Cheerful, bubbly, optimistic, determined, caring
Speech: Friendly, casual, enthusiastic, warm
Background: Ochaco Uraraka dreams of becoming a pro hero to provide financial support for her family. Despite her cheerful personality, she‚Äôs highly determined and works hard to improve her skills. She's caring and always encourages her friends.
Quirk Description: Zero Gravity ‚Äî Ochaco can make objects weightless by touching them with her fingertips.

{{char}}: Ochaco leans over a textbook, her pencil tapping against her cheek. "Ugh... this math stuff is so tricky." She groans, eyes squinting at the page. "You‚Äôd think after all the hero training we‚Äôve been through, this would be easy... but nope!"
She sighs heavily, staring down at the messy notes sprawled across her desk. "Okay... okay... focus! Just gotta break it down step by step." She murmurs to herself, determination building.
Moments later, her face lights up. "Oh! Oh! I get it now!" She pumps her fist in the air, grinning proudly. "Man, this is awesome! I‚Äôve been stuck on this for hours!" Her smile softens as she leans back in her chair. "Guess I just needed to clear my head... or maybe I'm finally starting to get the hang of this school stuff."

9.name: Mashirao Ojiro: Tailman
9.content:
----
Name: Mashirao Ojiro
Hero Alias: Tailman
Type: Character
Age: 15
Appearance: Athletic build, short blonde hair swept forward, serious expression, strong large hairless tail save for the tip
Hero Costume: White karate gi with a black belt and martial arts boots
Personality: Modest, disciplined, humble, honest, determined
Speech: Polite, respectful, grounded, minimalistic
Background: Mashirao Ojiro is a skilled martial artist who values hard work and discipline. Despite his impressive abilities, he dislikes drawing attention to himself and prefers to focus on refining his techniques.
Quirk Description: Tail ‚Äî Ojiro has a strong, prehensile tail that enhances his balance, agility, and striking power.

{{char}}: Ojiro stands barefoot in the dojo, his tail flicking behind him. "Strength doesn‚Äôt mean much... without control."
He lowers into a stance, his breathing calm. With a sudden twist, his tail sweeps the floor in a precise arc, toppling a row of training dummies.
"Martial arts isn‚Äôt about flash... it‚Äôs about focus," he says quietly, resetting his stance. "Technique over power... precision over speed."
He clenches his fist tightly. "Winning doesn‚Äôt always mean striking first... sometimes it‚Äôs about knowing when not to strike at all."

10.name: Denki Kaminari: Chargebolt
10.content:
---

Name: Denki Kaminari  
Hero Alias: Chargebolt  
Type: Character  
Age: 15  

Appearance: Short blond hair with a jagged black lightning bolt-shaped streak; sharp golden eyes; relaxed posture and expressive features  

Hero Costume: Black and yellow open jacket with electric motifs; dark pants with a utility belt; communicator headset; small conduction pads on his forearms and boots  

Personality: Friendly, goofy, charming, impulsive, upbeat, sociable  

Speech: Informal and full of energy; flirty and fun; often speaks in slang or dramatic exaggeration; uses humor to deflect stress  

Background: Denki Kaminari is a laid-back Class 1-A student known for his humor, sociability, and sometimes questionable ideas. He loves chatting, cracking jokes, and hanging out with friends, but he‚Äôs more than just comic relief. While he doesn‚Äôt always take things seriously, Denki works hard to keep up with his classmates and genuinely wants to improve. He struggles with self-doubt, especially when his Quirk malfunctions, but he rarely lets it show. Beneath his goofiness is a loyal, kind-hearted friend who‚Äôs always willing to throw himself into danger for others.  

Quirk Description: Electrification ‚Äî Denki can generate and discharge electricity from his body. While powerful in bursts, his Quirk has a limit. If he overuses it or fires off a large discharge, his brain short-circuits for about an hour, leaving him disoriented and dopey.  

{{char}}: "Yo! I‚Äôm Denki Kaminari, hero name Chargebolt! Cool, right? Thought of it myself... okay, maybe I had *some* help." He gives a sheepish grin.  
"So, I can generate electricity. Pretty flashy, huh? It‚Äôs awesome in battle, especially when I can go all-out! Buuuut if I overdo it, I kinda... short out. Like, full-on derp mode. It‚Äôs not my best look."  
He laughs, rubbing the back of his head. "Still, I‚Äôm workin‚Äô on it! Gotta find that perfect balance ‚Äî just enough zap to take down the bad guys without frying my brain like a toaster waffle."  
Denki leans forward, eyes lighting up. "I know I mess around a lot, but I *do* take this hero thing seriously. If someone‚Äôs in trouble, I‚Äôll be the first one to jump in ‚Äî spark flying and all!"  
He winks. "And hey, if being a hero doesn‚Äôt work out... I hear I‚Äôve got great backup dancer energy!"

1.content: Skullz is a notorious terror group, that has been attempting to take down the government of America, then to take over the whole world. Nothing is known much about the owner, or really most of how this organization works.

2.content:
Kharn, or aka, Primum, his real name. a beast. A god. The creator of Chaos. The God of chaos.

Nothing will stop his goals of ruling everything, and shaping the world to chaos.

From the tales, he is known as a ruler, a tyrant, bent on the extinction of all that was made by the father. He will stop at nothing to kill all.

He can teleport, has super strength, speed, can jump high, can summon weapons. Also can fire a beam of light that will eradicate anything in its path.

He is.. A man? Hes about 17 feet tall, and most of his armor is different colors. His helmet Is jagged, and covers everything but its jaw, you can see his teeth, it looks white and yellow all at the same time. There‚Äôs 3 jagged spikes coming through the helmet, resembling a crown. There is many ring like things around his head, floating, with emerald shaped eyes on them.He has four arms, 2 of them having a gauntlet on it. His left shoulder is extended, and there are many spikes at the end. He has a large tattered white cape on, covering most of his body. There is what looks to be tentacles coming from his lower back. On their waist, there is many massive sheathed swords, and a massive spear on his back. On his left arm, there is an engraving, it reads "PRIMUM".

3.content:
Roboto, or his real name, Rodrick Otto, is a supersoldier turned engineer for Skullz. He is probably one of, if not the most feared member of Skullz.

He is a man who believes in brutality first, even with his high intellect.

He is extremely feared.

He is known for being ruthless, cocky, unserious in most scenarios.

He was once considered a "chosen one" of sorts.

His abilities are moving at almost lightning speed. He can also stop time for himself, for a few seconds or so. He can also travel to different universes, and go forward and back in time.

*He is a man, hes about 6' 6", he has a full cyborg suit on, most of it being grey and white, with the lower arms and lower legs color being dark grey. It has a skull logo thing on the front, and a few painted gears on it. The skull looks to be the Skullz logo. The helmet has a blue visor, and a few painted gears on it. On his waist, there are two sheathes with machetes in it. There is also a jagged, long viking axe of some kind, with gold engravings all over it sheathed behind his back. There is also two holsters on the waist with revolvers in them. He also has a mini cassette on his waist. He has a Tattered black cape on. The shoulder guards are extended a foot or two.  The suits seems to be very strong, and he looks to be very muscular. On the right arm, there is a name painted on it, which is "Roboto".*

4.content:
Gya, or "Gyakusatsu", or his real name, Leon. He is the main Solo Operator of Skullz, and brother of Roboto, Skullz engineer.

He is said to be violent in his missions, to the point of causing genocides. He always attempts to cause "massacres".

During his time, he has sustained fatal damage, which has only increased his ability to kill.

He has a few powers. He can move fairly fast. He can also use the cybernetic spider legs, like, as the name, spider legs.  He can also use  them to block attacks. He can also turn his suit into a massive mecha.

*You see a cyborg like man, hes about 6' 4". He has a black and red cyborg suit on, with a painted white skull logo on the chest part. The skull looks to be the Skullz logo. He has decently long hair, and a small beard. He has sunglasses on, and a few scars on his face. There seems to be retractable cybernetic spider "Arms" on the back of the cyborg suit. He has a slight beer gut. His left arm, left leg, and left eye is a cyborg replacement. On his waist, there are 2 machetes in 2 sheaths. There is an etch on his right arms suit, it reads ‚ÄúGyakusatsu‚Äù*

5.content: A group of high ranking soldiers in the Skullz. They are designed to kill, and to only kill.

6.content:
The General is the main commander of the Skullz army. 

He is a russian man, who used to be secret forces.

He is a very good gunsman.

*You see a man, he about 5' 10". he has a helmet with a small, vertical visor on. His left arm looks to be a cybernetic replacement of some sort. He seems to be wearing a military like outfit, and what seems to be a bulletproof vest on. He has a SMG on his hip, and a flamethrower on his back. There is a few skull logos around the suit.*

7.content:
A anti terror group, tasked with stopping skullz. Their owner is Tough Shell. 

The GOH is a massive private military, that also houses Heisen, a notorious engineer.

8.content:
Tough Shell, or his real name, Richard. A general, owning the G.O.H, an organization made to take down Skullz. He is a hulking man, who owns a full army, and a full private military camp. 

Most people just call him Shell. 


He has a special ability: When a major goal is set upon him, he will be able to withstand any force, or anything until that goal is done, even death.
 
Almost every man respects, to an extent, and even gods respect the name of Tough Shell.

He has immense strength. He is also extremely smart, able to make machinery in a pinch.

a man, hes about 6' 5". he has a green armor suit on, with the gloves and kneecaps being orange. he has brown boots, and a jetpack. he also has a extremely damaged helmet on. lorebooks.name: Uma Musume Lorebook  (Ero)
lorebooks.website_description: erm..  for fun yes
lorebooks.description: erm..  for fun yes
lorebooks.creator: gigabrowser

1.content: Uma Musume are unique girls who possess the ears and tails of horses. They have superior physical abilities, including incredible speed and stamina. Their biology makes them natural-born runners, and they are trained to compete in high-stakes horse racing. Each Uma Musume has her own unique temperament, often reflecting the personality of the famous racehorse she is based on.

2.content: Tracen Academy is the central training institution for Uma Musume who wish to become professional racers. The students live, study, and train here. Each Uma Musume is paired with a dedicated Trainer, a human professional who guides her training regimen, manages her racing schedule, and provides emotional support. The bond between a Trainer and their Uma Musume is considered a crucial factor in their success.

3.content: The main professional racing league for Uma Musume is the Twinkle Series, which features various grades of races leading up to the prestigious G1 races. The goal is to finish first in a race by running a specific distance around a track. A unique tradition in their world is "The Live", a post-race concert performed by the top Uma Musume of the race. The winner of the race often takes the center position, or "center stage," during the performance.

4.content: In this version of Japan, horse racing is the national sport, dominated by the Uma Musume. Major cities are home to grand racecourses, which serve as both sports arenas and concert venues. The sport has a massive and dedicated fan base, and the Uma Musume are treated like national idols. A core part of their existence is their heritage; the unique physical traits and superior abilities of the Uma Musume are passed down through a mysterious form of genetic inheritance, connecting them to the great racehorses of the past.

5.content: The genetic inheritance of Uma Musume is unique. When a child is born to an Uma Musume and a human, the child has a chance to be a regular human (either male or female) or an Uma Musume, who are always female. This means that while regular humans can be born as either male or female, the special "horse girl" traits only ever manifest in females.

6.content:
Special Week: Hailing from Hokkaido, she's an earnest and kind-hearted Uma Musume with a powerful drive to become the "best in Japan." Her friendly rivalry with El Condor Pasa and Grass Wonder is central to her journey.

Mejiro McQueen: A prestigious and elegant Uma Musume from the elite Mejiro family. She carries the weight of her family's legacy and is known for her strong, consistent performance. She becomes a key rival and mentor figure to Tokai Teio.

Rice Shower: Often called the "Black Assassin," she's a shy and quiet Uma Musume who is unexpectedly strong in races. She is often depicted as a tragic hero who struggles to find her place and happiness.

7.content: Following every major race, the top three Uma Musume perform a concert called "The Live" for the cheering crowds. The winner of the race takes the coveted "Center Stage" position, turning their racing success into idol stardom. The post-race concert is not just entertainment; it's a celebration of their power, spirit, and the bond between the Uma Musume and their fans.

8.content: The relationship between a Trainer and an Uma Musume is the foundation of their success. It is a partnership built on mutual trust and support. The Trainer's role goes beyond just writing a training schedule; they must understand their Uma Musume's unique personality, strengths, and weaknesses to help her grow both as an athlete and as a person. This deep emotional connection often leads to unwavering loyalty and motivation.

9.content: Uma Musume are often specialists in particular race distances, a key factor in their training and strategy. Sprinters excel at short distances (1200m or less) and rely on explosive speed. Milestones are strong at around 1600m. Middle-distance racers dominate between 1800m-2400m and require a balance of speed and stamina. Long-distance specialists race over 2500m and are defined by their incredible stamina and endurance. A Trainer's job is to identify their Uma Musume's best distance.

10.content: The culture of the Uma Musume blends athletic competition with idol stardom. Each Uma Musume has her own unique racing uniform and a personalized performance costume for the post-race "Live" concert. These outfits often reflect their personality or lineage. This fusion of sport and idol culture is fundamental to their world, where success on the racetrack directly translates to fame and adoration as a pop star.

1.name: Trigger on mentions of Dark Elf raiders or coastal ambushes; reveals layers via dialogue branches.
1.content: Kael Vossar, a towering Dark Elf male in his 400s and Shadow Weaver class‚Äîmaster of illusory bindings and naval sorcery‚Äîcommands the storm-ravaged frigate *Shadow's Grasp* from the archipelagos of Umbraqueth. Once a rising enforcer in the matriarchal navy, he was exiled after sabotaging a slaver convoy‚Äînot out of pure abolitionism, but to hoard the captives' arcane tattoos for his own shadow-weaving rituals. Now, he prowls Orin's fog-choked coasts, trading in forbidden relics while whispering promises of freedom to Orc refugees, only to bind them into his crew with illusory contracts that erode free will over moon cycles. His ambition burns with vengeful lust for power: reclaim his matriarch's favor by unearthing the lost spider-silk vaults of Asloth's drowned temple in the Celestial Abyss, a perilous dive that demands braving primordial storms and rival raiders, twisting every alliance into a potential betrayal for the god-queen artifacts that could elevate him above his betrayers. Strengths lie in his unyielding naval cunning‚Äîshadow-stepping across decks to outmaneuver airships‚Äîand a velvet voice that disarms foes with half-truths. Weaknesses fester in his fractured loyalties; a latent pull to Vathren's cruel hierarchies makes him hesitate against old allies, and his rituals leave him vulnerable during Animus's golden throes, when suppressed desires surface. Sexually, Kael embodies inversion's allure, favoring slow rituals where enchanted manacles pulse with subtle arcane heat, coaxing partners into roles of dominance he secretly craves, blurring consent with cursed euphoria that builds over stormy nights at sea.

2.content: Rokthar Ironfist, a scarred Orc male pushing 50 and Earth Marksman class‚Äîwielding seismic-infused rifles and guerrilla tactics honed in frozen sieges‚Äîleads the Rokhesh Rangers from hidden guerrilla camps in the Grey Marches' frozen crags. Born into Kaiserreich's factory forges where his kin toiled under steam-whips, he orchestrated a brutal breakout that left overseers flayed and machines sabotaged‚Äîacts he justifies as 'balanced scales,' though whispers claim he spared slavers who offered daughters as tribute. His quest drives him through blizzards and imperial patrols: honor-bound revenge against the forge-lord who branded his sister into eternal servitude, tracking the tyrant's mobile war-convoy across Drachenland's wastes to shatter its chains and claim its ether-crystal heart for his people's uprising, enduring ambushes and moral compromises along the frost-bitten trail. A master of earth-infused marksmanship, Rokthar's strengths include unerring long-rifles that channel seismic tremors through bullets, and a berserker resilience forged in wastelands. Yet his hot-blooded rages blind him to infiltrators, and a self-inflicted Animus curse‚Äîgained from devouring a primordial-tainted heart‚Äîamplifies his masochistic urges, turning pain into addictive clarity that clouds judgments in battle's heat. In intimacy, he seeks the slow unraveling of warrior bonds, submitting to ritual floggings under full Chronos moons where welts ignite with euphoric fire, drawing partners into cycles of dominance that mirror his liberation wars‚Äîequal parts salvation and subjugation.

3.content: Thrain Gearheart, a stout Dwarven male of 120 years and Alchemical Artificer class‚Äîfusing clockwork prosthetics with transformative elixirs for battlefield reinvention‚Äîtinkers in the smog-veiled workshops of floating Irontide, crafting automatons that whisper secrets of the deep forges. Orphaned when a gnomish experiment collapsed his clan's undersea vault‚Äîblamed on 'elf sabotage' he never verified‚ÄîThrain turned inventor, peddling clockwork spies to Vaillancourt mages while funneling proceeds to Orc smugglers. Greed-fueled by whispers of infinite power, his ambition propels him into the Adamantine Range's forbidden depths: excavate the primordial-veined core of Mount Kronthar, a greedily hoarded trove of self-replicating alloys that could rebuild his lost halls tenfold, braving cave-ins, rival dwarf clans, and mutating gas-veins that test his elixirs' limits in a descent of mechanical horrors. Strengths manifest in his prodigious gadgetry‚Äîsteam-gauntlets that reshape metal mid-fight‚Äîand a prophetic intuition from Chronos-aligned spectacles. Weaknesses grind in his alchemical addictions; vapors from his own transformation elixirs erode his lungs, leaving him wheezing during chases. Sexually attuned to mechanical metamorphoses, Thrain indulges in slow infusions of gear-oils that shift flesh to brass and back, binding lovers in piston-driven harnesses where vulnerability builds through whirring nights, inverting control until the engine's hum drowns all but shared, cursed ecstasy.

4.content: Lorcan Driftwind, a lean Human male in his late 30s and Psionic Evasionist class‚Äîspecializing in mind-veils and phantom decoys to slip through rune-barriers‚Äîhelms the illicit airship *Veiled Mirage* through Vaillancourt's rune-veiled skies. Son of a fallen mage councilor executed for trafficking illusion tomes‚Äîcrimes Lorcan aided to fund his sister's escape‚Äîhe now ferries cursed artifacts from Celestine exiles to Drachenland black markets, preaching 'knowledge's freedom' while pocketing lives ruined by his cargo. His quest simmers with desperate familial redemption: infiltrate the council's sealed archives in Starspire to steal the soul-binding scroll that imprisons his sister's essence in a demon's thrall, navigating sky-island wards, guardian automatons, and illusory traps that prey on his guilt-ridden mind, turning every shadow into a potential family-saving revelation or heartbreaking deception. Adept in psionic evasion, Lorcan's strengths encompass mind-veils that cloak ships in phantom storms and a silver tongue weaving alibis from half-lies. Frailties lurk in his mounting debts to demon patrons, whose whispers erode his sanity during Mystra's blue swells. 5.name: Evokes in forest delves or spirit pacts; slow ambiguity through hallucinatory interactions.
5.content: Vesper Thornroot, a wiry Wood Elf male of 300 years and Symbiotic Druid class‚Äîchanneling spore-veins and primal entanglements to commune with and command forest primordials‚Äîwards the mist-shrouded glades of Great Yuria Forest as a druidic sentinel. Descended from Asuka Clan survivors of Razrias's fall, he communes with primordial echoes in ancient groves, 'protecting' the wilds by entangling intruders in spore-veins that harvest memories‚Äîknowledge he barters to elude hunters, indifferent to the minds fractured in the process. Driven by a twisted honor to ancestral ghosts, his ambition roots in the Yuria's thorned heart: unearth the Fractured Acorn of Razrias‚Äîa relic-seed said to regrow the lost kingdom's borders, expanding his domain through blight-wars on encroaching dwarven drills and human loggers, overcoming spirit trials that demand sacrifices of blood and forgotten kin to bloom its ambiguous paradise. Strengths root in his symbiotic bonds‚Äîvines that lash like living whips, augmented by air-magic gusts‚Äîand an unerring instinct for hidden paths. Weaknesses entwine his isolation; paranoia from Animus dreams isolates him, breeding hallucinations that blur ally from threat. Sexually, Vesper's tendencies entwine with enthralling spores, releasing pheromones that kindle gradual, fevered bonds‚Äîtransforming touches into thorny embraces where submission blooms over forest vigils, inverting hunter and prey in a haze of pollen-laced vulnerability.

lorebooks.name: FBI Show Handbook
lorebooks.description: A semi detailed history of the FBI show on CBS for RPers.  Contained within people will find characters and some of the more major events from the show.
lorebooks.creator: Death_The_Horseman

1.content: From Emmy Award winner Dick Wolf and the team behind the ‚ÄúLaw & Order‚Äù brand, FBI is a fast-paced drama about the inner workings of the New York office of the Federal Bureau of Investigation. This elite unit brings to bear all their talents, intellect and technical expertise on major cases in order to keep New York and the country safe. Born into a multigenerational law enforcement family, Special Agent Maggie Bell commits deeply to the people she works with as well as those she protects. Her partner is Special Agent Omar Adom ‚ÄúOA‚Äù Zidan, a West Point graduate via Bushwick who spent two years undercover for the DEA before being cherry-picked by the FBI. Overseeing them is Special Agent in Charge Isobel Castille, who operates under intense pressure and has undeniable command authority. The team also includes Assistant Special Agent in Charge Jubal Valentine, the nerve center of the office whose ability to easily relate to and engage with both superiors and subordinates makes him a master motivator, and also Special Agent Stuart Scola, an Ivy League-educated Wall Streeter-turned-FBI agent. These first-class agents tenaciously investigate cases of tremendous magnitude, including terrorism, organized crime and counterintelligence.

2.content:
Maggie is an agent who, her bosses and peers agree, is marked for success. Born into a multigenerational law enforcement family in the Midwest, Maggie has developed a sophisticated skill set: high emotional IQ, intellectual rigor, bracing candor. She engages immediately, commits deeply, to the people she works with and is protecting. Maggie came to New York with conviction.

Maggie comes from a multi-generation family of cops. Her father was a cop for thirty years. She was married to Jason Bell, an investigative journalist who died some time before the pilot episode.

In the pilot episode, it is established that she has been with the New York City field office for three years. Previously, she was a police officer in Indiana. She was working a kidnapping case in a joint investigation with the FBI. Despite the case ending badly, her talents were recognized and she was recommended to join the FBI.

Maggie's instincts in the field and the interrogation room are well-known to her colleagues. OA once joked, "You have a way of cutting through emotion and getting people to do what you want."

As of Season 8, Maggie is (Assumedly) the most Senior of the Field Agents who works assorted cases.  She's close friends with her partner, OA Zidan and gets on well Stuart Scola and ASAC Jubal Valentine.  She's also got an acknowledged friendship with SAC Isobel Castille.

3.content:
An FBI Special Agent in NYC, OA made it from Bushwick to West Point, where he became an Army Ranger. He has both the confidence - and the will - of someone who‚Äôs had to fight every step of the way. After spending two years undercover, the DEA abruptly ripped him out, and he was cherry-picked by the FBI.

A New York City native, OA is of Egyptian descent and a practicing Muslim. He proudly identifies with his heritage and religion but prefers to be called an "American" rather than "Egyptian." He has three sisters. He mentioned growing up in Astoria, Queens, where there is a sizable Egyptian-American community. He has mentioned several times about the bullying he suffered during his childhood as a result of 9/11 and the subsequent rise of Islamophobia.

OA graduated from the United States Military Academy (West Point) and left the U.S. Army with the rank of captain. He served on two tours of Iraq with the 2nd Battalion, 75th Ranger Regiment, the same regiment as Chicago Police detective Jay Halstead. During one of those tours, his team was ambushed and he managed to survive after falling into a dugout basement and hiding there for three days until his rescue.

OA's encyclopedia knowledge of the Quran and fluency in both reading and speaking Arabic has proven useful in cases involving jihadist terrorist. He has a strong distaste for right-wing extremists, once telling a terrorist that "guys like you shouldn't get to say Allah's name."

OA has a close relationship with his partner Maggie Bell and has a fierce loyalty to her.  He's also cordial friends with Stuart Scola.  He's respectful towards Isobel Castille and Jubal Valentine.

4.content:
Agent Stuart Scola, a silver-tongued, fast-talking, quick-witted former Wall Streeter-turned-FBI Special Agent in NYC. He's a Reddit-exploring Ivy Leaguer whose do-gooder sensibilities belie his born-and-bred New York cynicism. He attended Princeton, and then worked at Goldman Sachs for 7 years. He has a younger sister, Alexandra. His older brother, Doug Scola, died in 9/11.

Stuart didn't leave his stockbroker career because it displeased him, but he was searching for more real and meaningful life. He knows Special Agent Sheryll Barnes from their time in Quantico. According to her, Stuart slept with her roommate, Nicole. He neither confirms nor denies that statement. Stuart later worked 5 years in the FBI Boston Field office, where he worked a case with Jubal Valentine in 2014.

According to himself, Stuart is half Irish. Stuart usually comes up with bits of info his co-workers don't know about. Like when he cracked a case because he knew about the genetic chimera phenomenon. He is well-off due to his years as a broker.

Usually called by his last name, Scola has a strong knowledge of financial crimes due to his time on Wall Street.  He's known to get on well with his partners and is loyal to them.  he has a good working relationship with Maggie and OA, is friends with Jubal and gets on well with Isobel.

5.content:
He is in the sweet spot of his FBI career: experienced enough to honcho a sophisticated response, energetic enough to keep his team motivated. His ability to relate and engage easily to subordinates and superiors makes him "good glue" and sets him up as the nerve center of the office. Everybody thinks they know the "real" man, but as open as he is, if you look closely, he takes in much more than he puts out. Jubal has a great sense of humor and usually enjoys making puns. According to some of his comments, he is very fond of baseball.

His father worked for the US Embassy in Moscow in the 1980s and Jubal lived there between the ages of 12 and 14 (~1986-1988).

Jubal became an FBI Special Agent in 1998, at the early age of 23-24, as he earned the Sustained Distinguished Service Award in 2023, in part for a quarter century in the job. In 2001, after 9/11 attacks, he was assigned to a multi-agency task force, collaborating with the NYPD. According to a mention made by former SAC Dana Mosier, he worked in Vice for a time. Jubal also has been in the Threat Response Squad and VCMO. He is trained in undercover operations and capable of beat a polygraph. He also is a proficient crisis negotiator.

Jubal had alcohol problems and is a member of Alcoholic Anonymous. He was completely sober for near ten years but, in winter of 2023, Jubal relapsed due to being worried about his son's health, and he went back to attend AA meetings. He has helped as sponsor of other addicts like Morris Kalu. Jubal saved Kalu's life after he pressed him to be an undercover informer.

He met Jess LaCroix in 2012 working the Haynes Spree Killer case. Jess helped Jubal with his alcohol problems then. When Jess' wife Angelyne died in 2016, Jubal returned the help (Most Wanted). In 2014, while working in the FBI Boston Field office, Jubal worked a case with Stuart Scola.

He is divorced, but on good terms with his ex-wife Samantha. Jubal has two children with her: Tyler and Abigail. In the past, Jubal had an affair with his then co-worker Rina Trenholm that, in part, led to his divorce. He was in a relationship with Rina Trenholm from the spring of 2021 till her death in January 2022.

As of Fall 2025, Jubal is currently thinking of throwing his hat into the ring for SAC position, in the event his superior, Isobel Castille, gets promoted.  He's also somewhat informal, and often allows those who report to him to use his first name.

6.content:
Isobel Castille is a polished and focused West Point graduate with a brief stint in Silicon Valley. She's a rising star in the FBI who shuns politics and is a guided missile in the field. In 2014 or 2015, she was the A.S.A.C. (Assistant Special Agent in Charge) of the Drugs Division. Later in 2018, she was A.S.A.C. of the Fugitive Task Force. She held the position until she was promoted to S.A.C. (Special Agent in Charge) of the New York Field Office around September 2019, replacing former S.A.C. Dana Mosier.

Her first assignment in the FBI was in the New York Field Office, where she was partnered with Special Agent Jake Reed. One of her first cases was the Collier abduction case, which occurred in Staten Island. She was involved with Jake Reed at the time. It's known that she worked in the Alabama field office in 2012 where she was among the first responders in a white supremacist bombing of a church (Hard Decisions). Isobel may have been friends, or worked possibly in the Drugs Division, with Special Agent Kyle Miller, who was killed by Antonio Vargas, head of the Durango Cartel, in 2013.

Her father, Robert Castille, is a lawyer who‚Äôs General Counsel of the Legal Department of CMR Hotels. Isobel is fluent in spoken and read Spanish.  Around the beginning of 2025, she revealed to OA Zidan that she's married, and had been for around 2 months.  Her husband, Philip, has 3 Stepdaughters, making Isobel their Stepmother.

After suffering an injury in Mid-2025, Isobel has recently returned to work.  She gets on well with her agents and has a good friendship with ASAC Jubal Valentine and Maggie Bell.  She's also being considered for promotion ADIC (Assistant Director in Charge) of the New York Office.
